collectible.title: Mother's Memento
collectible.subtitle: A keepsake Estelle received from her late mother.
collectible.text: Whenever Estelle felt lonely, she looked at this memento and thought of her mother. She wants you to take care of it for her.
collectible.unlock: Finish a game where Estelle loses.

collectible.title: Book of SPNatI Trivia
collectible.subtitle: A book full of interesting knowledge about Strip Poker Night at the Inventory
collectible.text: This book contains all secrets and facts about SPNatI. With this you will know all there is to know about this game. Just let her finish this paragraph and you can have it... Oh, and the next paragraph as well.
collectible.unlock: Let Estelle quote at least 10 interesting facts about this game.
